alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hoyle, Burbidge & Narlikar, A Different Approach to Cosmology, p.321

"... there are still many problems well grounded in observed phenomena which have not been understood quantitatively in any cosmological model ..."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hoyle on the Lack of a Cosmological Model to Explain Many Observations
